channel.title: Mitb
channel.description: Does MoparIsTheBest even read his personal messages? I wanted to maybe meet him in real life to take a picture for the notebook or whatever, but I never got a reply back. Also is this a bad idea? Should I not want to meet him in real life? ;)

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Well like I said, he does read his PM’s. If he doesn’t answer you then feel free to hit him up on the IRC when hes on.

Locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Do you live in Ohio? Also, I think he would go for it (as long as your parents are ok with it…) After all we have always wanted to do a ‘MoparCon(vention)’.

and yes he does read his pm’s.

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:2, topic:388197”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=484016.msg3545926#msg3545926 date=1301187274]
Does MoparIsTheBest even read his personal messages? I wanted to maybe meet him in real life to take a picture for the notebook or whatever, but I never got a reply back. Also is this a bad idea? Should I not want to meet him in real life?
[/quote]
I heard he owns a van and drives to elementary schools in his boxer shorts handing out candy and giving kids rides home.
But if you want to meet him go ahead.[/quote]
b&

l0l.
